amendment.description: Amendment sought to redirect funding for the Department of Homeland Security Management and Operations account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in the Congressional Record to redirect funding of the Office of the Secretary and Executive Management.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brown (OH) amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 167 - 255 (Roll no. 212).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Brown (OH).
